Table.Name: machoLMCSource
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided in the MACHO Lightcurve Statistical Summary Table for each source in the LMC fields

Column.Name: id
Column.Description: MACHO star identification (field.tile.seq)

Column.Name: seqNum
Column.Description: Sequential number (unique object ID)

Column.Name: cx
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: cy
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: cz
Column.Description: unit vector of spherical co-ordinates

Column.Name: htmID
Column.Description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (HTM) index, 20 deep, for equatorial co-ordinates

Column.Name: ra
Column.Description: J2000 right ascension

Column.Name: dec
Column.Description: J2000 declination

Column.Name: npoints
Column.Description: number of observations on the MACHO tile containing this star

Column.Name: rN
Column.Description: red: number of good points on Lightcurve (LC)

Column.Name: rmagave
Column.Description: red: median magnitude of LC in instrumental units

Column.Name: rerrave
Column.Description: red: average error of measurements on LC in units of A, where A is the the measured flux divided by the median flux.

Column.Name: rsig
Column.Description: red: sqrt of variance of A-1 measurements over LC.

Column.Name: rchi2w
Column.Description: red: chi^2 per degree of freedom of fit to "constant flux" hypothesis weighted by flux errors

Column.Name: rqw
Column.Description: red: probability of getting value as large as rchi2w by chance

Column.Name: rNr
Column.Description: red: number of points on robustified LC

Column.Name: rerraver
Column.Description: red: average error on robustified LC

Column.Name: rchi2r
Column.Description: red: chi^2 per degree of freedom for robustified LC (variable star search)

Column.Name: rqr
Column.Description: red: probability of getting value as large as rchi2r by chance

Column.Name: rs5
Column.Description: red: number of points on LC 5-sigma above median

Column.Name: rs5d
Column.Description: red: number of points on LC 5-sigma below median (eclipsing binary search)

Column.Name: rmagaveu
Column.Description: red: median magnitude in instrumental units before removing bad points

Column.Name: rdskyave
Column.Description: red: average of red dsky sodophot measure

Column.Name: rdskysig
Column.Description: red: sqrt of variance of red dsky sodophot measure

Column.Name: rpsfave
Column.Description: red: average over LC of sodophot measure of goodness of psf fit

Column.Name: rpsfsig
Column.Description: red: sqrt of variance of red psf sodophot measure

Column.Name: rcrdave
Column.Description: red: average of crowding sodophot measure

Column.Name: rcosmave
Column.Description: red: average of cosmic ray sodophot measure

Column.Name: rmissave
Column.Description: red: average of missing pixel sodophot measure

Column.Name: bN
Column.Description: blue: number of good points on Lightcurve (LC)

Column.Name: bmagave
Column.Description: blue: median magnitude of LC in instrumental units

Column.Name: berrave
Column.Description: blue: average error of measurements on LC in units of A, where A is the the measured flux divided by the median flux.

Column.Name: bsig
Column.Description: blue: sqrt of variance of A-1 measurements over LC.

Column.Name: bchi2w
Column.Description: blue: chi^2 per degree of freedom of fit to "constant flux" hypothesis weighted by flux errors

Column.Name: bqw
Column.Description: blue: probability of getting value as large as rchi2w by chance

Column.Name: bNr
Column.Description: blue: number of points on robustified LC

Column.Name: berraver
Column.Description: blue: average error on robustified LC

Column.Name: bchi2r
Column.Description: blue: chi^2 per degree of freedom for robustified LC (variable star search)

Column.Name: bqr
Column.Description: blue: probability of getting value as large as rchi2r by chance

Column.Name: bs5
Column.Description: blue: number of points on LC 5-sigma above median

Column.Name: bs5d
Column.Description: blue: number of points on LC 5-sigma below median (eclipsing binary search)

Column.Name: bmagaveu
Column.Description: blue: median magnitude in instrumental units before removing bad points

Column.Name: bdskyave
Column.Description: blue: average of blue dsky sodophot measure

Column.Name: bdskysig
Column.Description: blue: sqrt of variance of blue dsky sodophot measure

Column.Name: bpsfave
Column.Description: blue: average over LC of sodophot measure of goodness of psf fit

Column.Name: bpsfsig
Column.Description: blue: sqrt of variance of blue psf sodophot measure

Column.Name: bcrdave
Column.Description: blue: average of crowding sodophot measure

Column.Name: bcosmave
Column.Description: blue: average of cosmic ray sodophot measure

Column.Name: bmissave
Column.Description: blue: average of missing pixel sodophot measure

Column.Name: bmrN
Column.Description: number of points on the B-R LC [aka simultaneous R/B pts]

Column.Name: bmrsig
Column.Description: sqrt of variance of B-R LC

Column.Name: bmrchi2w
Column.Description: chi^2 per degree of freedom for B-R LC

Column.Name: bmrave
Column.Description: average of B-R

Column.Name: bmrprobspear
Column.Description: B-R ?

Column.Name: rbcross
Column.Description: red/blue A-1 robustified measurements over LC cross correlation coefficient [Welch-Stetson; see AJ 105, 1813]

Column.Name: rauto
Column.Description: red: A-1 robustified measurements over LC autocorrelation (lag=0) coefficient

Column.Name: bauto
Column.Description: blue: A-1 robustified measurements over LC autocorrelation (lag=0) coefficient

Column.Name: filterN
Column.Description: number of filters applied; always 3

Column.Name: filter1_rfilmax
Column.Description: Filter 1, red: max value of optimum filter for LC

Column.Name: filter1_rfiltime
Column.Description: Filter 1, red: LC time at which maximum occurred

Column.Name: filter1_rNhi
Column.Description: Filter 1, red: number points sigmathreshold high within duration of filter at peak (rfiltime)

Column.Name: filter1_bfilmax
Column.Description: Filter 1, blue: max value of optimum filter for LC

Column.Name: filter1_bfiltime
Column.Description: Filter 1, blue: LC time at which maximum occurred

Column.Name: filter1_bNhi
Column.Description: Filter 1, blue: number points sigmathreshold high within duration of filter at peak (bfiltime)

Column.Name: filter2_rfilmax
Column.Description: Filter 2, red: max value of optimum filter for LC

Column.Name: filter2_rfiltime
Column.Description: Filter 2, red: LC time at which maximum occurred

Column.Name: filter2_rNhi
Column.Description: Filter 2, red: number points sigmathreshold high within duration of filter at peak (rfiltime)

Column.Name: filter2_bfilmax
Column.Description: Filter 2, blue: max value of optimum filter for LC

Column.Name: filter2_bfiltime
Column.Description: Filter 2, blue: LC time at which maximum occurred

Column.Name: filter2_bNhi
Column.Description: Filter 2, blue: number points sigmathreshold high within duration of filter at peak (bfiltime)

Column.Name: filter3_rfilmax
Column.Description: Filter 3, red: max value of optimum filter for LC

Column.Name: filter3_rfiltime
Column.Description: Filter 3, red: LC time at which maximum occurred

Column.Name: filter3_rNhi
Column.Description: Filter 3, red: number points sigmathreshold high within duration of filter at peak (rfiltime)

Column.Name: filter3_bfilmax
Column.Description: Filter 3, blue: max value of optimum filter for LC

Column.Name: filter3_bfiltime
Column.Description: Filter 3, blue: LC time at which maximum occurred

Column.Name: filter3_bNhi
Column.Description: Filter 3, blue: number points sigmathreshold high within duration of filter at peak (bfiltime)

Table.Name: machoSMCSource
Table.Description: Contains the parameters provided in the MACHO Lightcurve Statistical Summary Table for each source in the SMC fields
